participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, introspective, and passionate about literature.
participant_1.background: I'm not a morning person, but I'll do it for my best friend. I'm not sure if I'm good at keeping up with my family, but I love them and I try to make time for them whenever I can. I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college. Under a pen name, I write romance books. I live with a roommate.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Active, sociable, and adventurous with a love for the outdoors.
participant_2.background: I'm on the go with my cosplay gear, so I have to work out to stay in shape. I'm a hard worker who loves to fish on the weekends. I like to go for bike rides. I am 6 foot tall. I chew my nails even though I know it's not good for me.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm excited to start my new chapter in life at college.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great. What are you studying?
I'm studying English literature. I'm really excited to learn more about my favorite authors.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll love it. I'm a big fan of classic literature myself.
Me too! I love reading books by Jane Austen, Charles Dickens, and Mark Twain.
Those are all great authors! I'm also a fan of Edgar Allan Poe and H.G. Wells.
I've heard good things about Edgar Allan Poe, but I haven't read any of his books yet.
You should definitely check him out! He's a really good writer.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and watch movies. I also like to go for walks and bike rides.
Those all sound like great hobbies. I like to do a lot of the same things.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime and do something fun together.
I would love that! Let's exchange numbers and we can make plans.
